MediaItem.title: MediaItem
MediaItem.description: Represents a movie or TV show in the user's library.

id.description: Unique identifier for the media item.

title.description: The title of the media item.

year.description: The release year of the media item.

filePath.description: The file path to the media item on disk.

tags.description: Custom tags or genres for the media item.

isWatched.description: Indicates whether the user has watched the media item.

definition.description: Stores media items owned by a specific user. Includes denormalized userId for authorization independence. This path structure allows for path-based ownership, making security rules simple and efficient.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier of the user.

params.name: mediaItemId
params.description: The unique identifier of the media item.
